item.title: My french project on quebec
item.dc:creator: @ninjasod ninjasod
item.description:
@ninjasod wrote:

NickMoran06:

Quebec is in Montreal in Canada, not France :S

My french teacher told us to do a project on french speaking countries, and since I wanted to do Canada, she told me to do Quebec.
BTW thanks for the fact

item.title: My french project on quebec
item.dc:creator: @ninjasod ninjasod
item.description:
@ninjasod wrote:

Can anyone help me on this?
I need…
Population;
Type of government;
2 interesting facts;
Minimum of 5 illustrations, photots or graphs concering culture, history, art, products, entertainment, etc.;
A map of canada/quebec either one will do;
A picture of a flag (I can find that easy);
Main religions;
Current president;

Thanks!
~NinjaSoD[br][size=1]Posted on: January 24, 2007, 12:28:47 PM[/size][hr]Actually can you help me get the head of government in Quebec? Like the mayor or something.
Thanks again,
~NinjaSoD

I’m also at school right now :O[br][size=1]Posted on: January 24, 2007, 12:30:21 PM[/size][hr]found the mayor
